= Development Design Spec =

== Functionality Strategy ==
*Basic functions of financial ledger.(Very High)
#Record daily financial event with some necessary fields;
View the records;
Keep data consistently
Fast entry: Try to provide user a way to enter financial record easier than other other financial software;(High)
Records entry templates
Schedule templates
Credit Management
Store data with transparency(High)
We do not provide space for user to store the data. What we do is try to help user to store their financial data in consistent.
Provide "Cloud" function, but we do not store the data. Our "Cloud" function is based on "Cloud" service, like IOS Cloud, Skydriver.
Reporting(High)
Investment analysis(Medium)
Help user to make decision on their investment
